title: Building A16Z's Personal AI Workstation
summary:
This a16z article details the creation of a high-performance personal AI workstation designed for researchers, founders, developers, and engineers working with large AI models. The workstation prioritizes local compute power for tasks like training, fine-tuning, and inference to minimize latency, maximize control, and ensure data privacy, all while avoiding the complexities of cloud-based solutions.

The core of the system is four NVIDIA RTX 6000 Pro Blackwell Max-Q GPUs, providing a total of 384GB of VRAM. This setup ensures full PCIe 5.0 x16 bandwidth to each GPU, crucial for maximizing GPU-to-CPU data transfer. It also boasts 8TB of NVMe 5.0 storage, configurable in RAID 0 for extremely fast data access. 256GB of ECC DDR5 RAM rounds out the memory capabilities.

The workstation is powered by an AMD Ryzen Threadripper PRO 7975WX CPU. Despite its power, the entire system draws a manageable 1650W and fits under a desk, operable on a standard 15-amp/120V circuit. The build is designed to potentially support NVIDIA GPUDirect Storage (GDS) for direct data streaming from NVMe SSDs to GPU VRAM, further reducing latency.

The workstation’s intended use cases include training large language models (LLMs), running multimodal inference, experimenting with model parallelism, and streaming high-throughput datasets for reinforcement learning. It aims to provide a self-contained environment for AI development, eliminating cloud dependency.

title: RFC 9839 and Bad Unicode
summary:
Tim Bray's article discusses RFC 9839, a document co-authored with Paul Hoffman that addresses the issue of "bad Unicode" characters in data structures and protocols, particularly text fields. While Unicode itself is beneficial, some characters can cause problems due to their ambiguous meanings, potential for misuse, or incompatibility with different programming languages and systems.

RFC 9839 identifies problematic character classes like control characters (e.g., U+0089), unpaired surrogates (related to UTF-16 encoding), and noncharacters (e.g., U+7FFFF). The RFC offers three "less-bad" subsets of Unicode that developers can choose to exclude problematic characters from their text fields, aiming to improve interoperability and prevent unexpected behavior.

The author argues that while standards like JSON technically allow these problematic characters, explicitly excluding them is a good practice. He contrasts RFC 9839 with the more comprehensive but complex PRECIS framework (RFC 8264), suggesting that 9839's simplicity makes it more likely to be adopted.

Bray also provides a Go-language library for validating text fields against the specified subsets. He includes a table comparing how various data formats and standards (CBOR, I-JSON, JSON, Protobufs, TOML, XML, YAML) handle surrogates, legacy controls, and noncharacters. He concludes by reflecting on the challenges of creating an RFC through individual submission compared to the traditional Working Group approach. The RFC aims to provide a practical solution for developers to handle problematic Unicode in their applications.

RFC 9839 识别了诸如控制字符（例如，U+0089）、未配对代理项（与 UTF-16 编码相关）和非字符（例如，U+7FFFF）等有问题的字符类。 RFC 提供了 Unicode 的三个“不那么糟糕”的子集，开发人员可以选择从其文本字段中排除有问题的字符，旨在提高互操作性并防止意外行为。

作者认为，虽然像 JSON 这样的标准在技术上允许这些有问题的字符，但明确排除它们是一种很好的做法。 他将 RFC 9839 与更全面但复杂的 PRECIS 框架 (RFC 8264) 进行了对比，认为 9839 的简单性使其更有可能被采用。

布雷还提供了一个 Go 语言库，用于针对指定的子集验证文本字段。 他包含一个表格，比较了各种数据格式和标准（CBOR、I-JSON、JSON、Protobufs、TOML、XML、YAML）如何处理代理项、旧控制字符和非字符。 他最后反思了与传统工作组方法相比，通过个人提交创建 RFC 所面临的挑战。 该 RFC 旨在为开发人员提供一个实用的解决方案来处理其应用程序中有问题的 Unicode。

title: Writing Speed-of-Light Flash Attention for 5090 in CUDA C++
summary:
This article details the author's journey in implementing Flash Attention for the NVIDIA 5090 GPU using CUDA C++. The goal is to learn CUDA C++ attention implementation, particularly for features unavailable in Triton, such as MXFP8/NVFP4 MMA for sm120.

The author starts by outlining the Flash Attention 2 algorithm, using a Python-like representation and focusing on tile-based processing with register memory for tile_Q. The implementation involves loading data from global memory to shared memory using `cp.async` and then from shared memory to register memory using `ldmatrix`, followed by MMA (matrix multiplication and accumulation) using `mma.m16n8k16`.

The first version (v1) is a basic implementation focusing on correctness, foregoing optimizations like shared memory swizzling and pipelining.  It emphasizes the data transfer process, including details on coalesced memory access, shared memory addresses, and synchronization using `__syncthreads()`.  The author explains how warps are partitioned to handle portions of tile_Q and the layout requirements for `ldmatrix` when loading data for MMA. The final version of the article shows a draft of the CUDA kernel with the core logic, including loading, MMA, and writing output, while noting that online softmax will be covered in further versions.  Performance benchmarks are provided, showcasing improvements with later versions which include various optimizations such as shared memory swizzling and pipelining.
chinese_title: 使用CUDA C++编写适用于5090的光速闪存注意力
chinese_summary:

作者首先概述了Flash Attention 2算法，使用类似Python的表示，并专注于基于tile的处理，其中tile_Q使用寄存器内存。实现过程包括使用`cp.async`将数据从全局内存加载到共享内存，然后使用`ldmatrix`从共享内存加载到寄存器内存，最后使用`mma.m16n8k16`进行MMA（矩阵乘法和累加）。

第一个版本（v1）是一个基本的实现，侧重于正确性，放弃了共享内存混洗和流水线优化等。它强调了数据传输过程，包括关于合并内存访问、共享内存地址以及使用`__syncthreads()`进行同步的详细信息。作者解释了如何对warp进行分区以处理tile_Q的部分，以及使用`ldmatrix`加载数据进行MMA时的布局要求。文章的最终版本展示了一个CUDA内核草案，其中包含核心逻辑，包括加载、MMA和写入输出，并指出在线softmax将在后续版本中介绍。提供了性能基准，展示了后续版本中包括各种优化（例如共享内存混洗和流水线优化）后的改进。

title: Manim: Animation engine for explanatory math videos
summary:
Manim is a Python-based animation engine, initially developed by 3Blue1Brown, for creating explanatory math videos. There are two versions: the original (ManimGL) and a community-maintained fork (Manim Community). This document focuses on ManimGL.

To install ManimGL, Python 3.7 or higher is required, along with FFmpeg, OpenGL, and optionally LaTeX. Installation can be done via `pip install manimgl`.  Specific instructions are provided for Linux, Windows, and Mac OSX, including details on installing dependencies like FFmpeg, LaTeX (MiKTeX recommended for Windows, brew for Mac), and Cairo (for ARM-based Macs). Instructions for Anaconda environments are also available.

The document explains how to run Manim and view examples, using the command `manimgl example_scenes.py OpeningManimExample`. It lists useful command-line flags for controlling the output and playback, such as `-w` for writing to a file, `-s` for showing the final frame, and `-n` for skipping animations.  It also mentions `custom_config.yml` for configuration, allowing customization of output paths, style, and video quality.

Documentation is available at 3b1b.github.io/manim, with a Chinese version at docs.manim.org.cn. Contributions are welcome, especially to the more active community edition. The project is MIT licensed.

title: Librebox: An open source, Roblox-compatible game engine
summary:
Librebox is an open-source game engine aiming for Roblox compatibility, allowing Luau code to run independently of the Roblox platform. The goal is to give developers control over their games and platforms while utilizing their existing Lua skills. Currently in a demo stage, Librebox supports basic scene rendering, lighting, parts, camera movement, and core data types. It also implements a significant portion of the Instance API and client-sided services like Workspace and RunService. Luau script support is included with a task scheduler and coroutines.

Future plans include incorporating UserInputService, StarterPlayer, physics, mesh support, game.Players, GUIs, and eventually replication for server functionality. The engine is being developed with cross-platform compatibility in mind, starting with Windows.

Librebox is not affiliated with Roblox and does not use any of Roblox's source code or assets. The project aims to provide an entirely open-source alternative, offering full client compatibility first, then server functionality. It uses Luau (MIT licensed) and raylib (zlib/libpng licensed). Releases can be downloaded from the project page, and the engine offers command-line arguments for configuration.

title: Rethinking the Linux cloud stack for confidential VMs
summary:
This LWN.net article discusses the challenges and solutions for implementing confidential VMs in Linux cloud environments. Confidential computing aims to protect guest VM memory even from the hypervisor, enhancing privacy but creating tension with performance optimization efforts like I/O passthrough.

The article highlights the security-performance trade-off, where offloading I/O for speed compromises security through reduced visibility and reliance on hardware and firmware. A potential solution is extending confidential computing to devices themselves using technologies like AMD's SEV-TIO and the TDISP standard, enabling secure communication and DMA to encrypted VM memory, avoiding performance-sapping bounce buffers.

The article then delves into the changes needed throughout the Linux cloud stack, starting with Secure Boot. It explains the process, the introduction of a Secure VM Service Module (SVSM), and the remote attestation process involving an Attester, Verifier, and Endorser to ensure platform integrity. The article touches on different approaches to confidential computing, such as Microsoft's LVBS, and the need for a shared understanding of their trade-offs.

Runtime overheads, such as DRAM encryption/decryption and the process of accepting memory pages, are discussed. Scaling is also a challenge, limited by factors like the number of available address-space identifiers (ASIDs). The article concludes by considering the impact on features like swap memory, network communication, live migration and emphasizes that confidential computing is changing the trust model in Linux cloud environments, deepening reliance on hardware and firmware vendors.

文章随后深入探讨了整个Linux云堆栈中需要的更改，首先是安全启动。它解释了这个过程、安全虚拟机服务模块(SVSM)的引入，以及涉及Attester、Verifier和Endorser的远程证明过程，以确保平台完整性。文章提到了不同的机密计算方法，例如微软的LVBS，以及对它们的权衡进行共享理解的必要性。

文章讨论了运行时开销，例如DRAM加密/解密以及接受内存页的过程。扩展也是一个挑战，受到可用地址空间标识符(ASID)数量等因素的限制。文章最后考虑了对交换内存、网络通信、实时迁移等功能的影响，并强调机密计算正在改变Linux云环境中的信任模型，加深对硬件和固件供应商的依赖。

title: Developer's block
summary:
This article discusses "Developer's Block," a form of paralysis similar to writer's block, that affects software developers. It outlines two main scenarios where it occurs: at the start of a new project and during the development of an existing one.

At the beginning of a project, developer's block arises from the pressure to implement all best practices from the outset, such as comprehensive testing, thorough documentation, adherence to coding standards, and robust error handling. While valuable, the accumulation of these tasks can lead to feeling overwhelmed.

Later in a project, block can stem from feeling overwhelmed by a large existing codebase (especially when new to the project) or a loss of motivation due to overwork.

The article provides several solutions for overcoming developer's block, including:

*   **Take time with learning:** Deliberately allocate time for understanding the codebase and language.
*   **Realize when you're tired:** Recognize and address mental exhaustion through breaks and less demanding tasks.
*   **Work incrementally:** Focus on small, manageable features and defer less critical tasks.
*   **Write a prototype:** Create a quick, minimal solution to gain traction and understanding.
*   **Start with draft documentation:** Prioritize basic documentation and refine it later.
*   **Avoid premature optimization:** Focus on clear, understandable code first and optimize only when necessary.
*   **Release early, release often:** Regularly release code to gain momentum and feedback.
*   **Choose which yaks to shave:** Avoid getting bogged down in fixing minor issues with dependencies or tooling.
chinese_title: 开发者瓶颈
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了“开发者阻塞”，一种类似于写作障碍的瘫痪状态，会影响软件开发者。文章概述了其发生的两种主要情景：新项目启动时和现有项目开发过程中。

在项目初期，开发者阻塞源于一开始就实施所有最佳实践的压力，例如全面的测试、详尽的文档、遵守编码标准以及强大的错误处理。 虽然这些很有价值，但这些任务的积累会导致感到不知所措。

在项目后期，阻塞可能源于对大型现有代码库（尤其是刚接触项目时）感到不知所措，或因过度劳累而失去动力。

本文提供了克服开发者阻塞的几种解决方案，包括：

*   **花时间学习：** 特意安排时间来理解代码库和语言。
*   **意识到何时疲倦：** 识别并通过休息和不太费力的任务来解决精神疲惫。
*   **增量工作：** 专注于小型、可管理的功能，并推迟不太关键的任务。
*   **编写原型：** 创建一个快速、最小的解决方案，以获得牵引力和理解。
*   **从草稿文档开始：** 优先考虑基本文档，并在以后进行完善。
*   **避免过早优化：** 首先专注于清晰、易于理解的代码，仅在必要时进行优化。
*   **尽早发布，频繁发布：** 定期发布代码以获得动力和反馈。
*   **选择要刮的牦牛皮：** 避免陷入修复依赖项或工具的小问题中。

title: I Hacked Monster Energy and You Won't Believe What They Think You Look Like
summary:
A hacker investigated Monster Energy's corporate infrastructure and found significant security vulnerabilities. They easily gained access to "Monster University," an internal training platform, by exploiting a flawed registration system. Inside, they discovered training materials, including a stereotypical and arguably offensive description of Monster's target consumer: a young, lower-income, Caucasian (or Hispanic) male. The platform ironically hosted cybersecurity training despite its own lack of security.

The hacker also found Zoom meeting schedules, an internal employee reward system called "Beast Bux," and, most alarmingly, a completely exposed OpenText API. This API allowed anyone to search and download documents from Monster's entire corporate file system, including contracts and internal documents, without any authentication.

Additionally, the hacker uncovered a ClickUp integration on a subdomain that exposed an admin's private account token in the website's JavaScript. This token granted full access to Monster's ClickUp workspace, allowing the hacker to view private documents, modify project data, and invite themselves to the workspace, which they did to demonstrate the vulnerability.

The hacker attempted to contact Monster Energy directly about these issues but received no response. ClickUp addressed the token issue after being alerted by the hacker, but Monster has yet to acknowledge the reported vulnerabilities, and the OpenText API remains exposed. The author criticizes Monster for their poor security practices and stereotypical customer profiling, suggesting they prioritize security over marketing.

title: 450× Faster Joins with Index Condition Pushdown
summary:
This article discusses a performance optimization in Readyset for "straddled joins," where filtering predicates apply to both sides of a join. Initially, Readyset used hash joins, which proved inefficient when one side of the join had a low-cardinality filter, leading to full table scans, high I/O, and memory usage.

Profiling revealed excessive data reads and disk I/O as the bottleneck, even after disabling compression. The engine independently evaluated both sides of the join, regardless of selectivity.

To address this, Readyset implemented Index Condition Pushdown (ICP). This new strategy first applies the predicate to one side of the join, collects the resulting join keys, and then pushes a composite condition (including the join key and the original predicate from the other side) to the storage engine (RocksDB). This enables index-based retrieval of only relevant rows, minimizing unnecessary data reads and full table scans.

A benchmark comparing the old hash join approach to the new ICP strategy showed a dramatic performance improvement. The ICP implementation yielded a >450x increase in throughput and a >450x reduction in latency due to increased cache and index efficiency. This optimization is critical for maintaining performance consistency during cache misses in Readyset.
chinese_title: 使用索引条件下推技术，连接速度提升450倍
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了Readyset中针对“跨越式连接”的性能优化，在这种连接中，过滤谓词同时应用于连接的两侧。最初，Readyset使用哈希连接，但当连接的一侧具有低基数过滤器时，这被证明效率低下，导致全表扫描、高I/O和内存使用。

分析表明，即使禁用压缩，过度的数据读取和磁盘I/O仍然是瓶颈。引擎独立评估连接的双方，而不管选择性如何。

为了解决这个问题，Readyset实现了索引条件下推（ICP）。这种新策略首先将谓词应用于连接的一侧，收集生成的连接键，然后将复合条件（包括连接键和另一侧的原始谓词）推送到存储引擎（RocksDB）。这使得可以基于索引检索仅相关的行，从而最大限度地减少不必要的数据读取和全表扫描。

一项比较旧哈希连接方法和新ICP策略的基准测试显示，性能有了显着提高。由于缓存和索引效率的提高，ICP的实现使吞吐量提高了450倍以上，延迟降低了450倍以上。这种优化对于在Readyset中缓存未命中期间保持性能一致性至关重要。

title: Waitgroups: What they are, how to use them and what changed with Go 1.25
summary:
This article discusses the use of `sync.WaitGroup` in Go for managing concurrent goroutines, highlighting a significant improvement introduced in Go 1.25. Before Go 1.25, developers had to manually increment a counter (`wg.Add(1)`) before launching a goroutine and decrement it (`wg.Done()`) within the goroutine to signal completion. Failure to maintain accurate counts could lead to deadlocks or panics. The `goleak` library could be used to detect goroutine leaks in these cases.

Go 1.25 simplifies this process with the introduction of `wg.Go(func(){...})`. This new function automatically handles the adding and done signaling for each goroutine, eliminating the potential for manual errors. While `wg.Go` expects a function without arguments, functions needing arguments can be wrapped in an anonymous function.

The article also briefly mentions another improvement in Go 1.25: automatic detection of CPU limits in containerized environments (Kubernetes), negating the need for libraries like `automaxprocs` to set `GOMAXPROCS` correctly. The author encourages exploration of other features within the `sync` package and provides a link to a repository containing the examples.
chinese_title: WaitGroup：用途、用法及Go 1.25变更
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了Go语言中`sync.WaitGroup`的使用，以管理并发goroutine，并重点介绍了Go 1.25中引入的一项重大改进。在Go 1.25之前，开发者必须在启动goroutine之前手动增加计数器（`wg.Add(1)`），并在goroutine内部递减计数器（`wg.Done()`）以表示完成。未能保持准确的计数可能导致死锁或panic。`goleak`库可用于检测这些情况下的goroutine泄漏。

Go 1.25通过引入`wg.Go(func(){...})`简化了此过程。这个新函数自动处理每个goroutine的添加和完成信号，消除了手动错误的潜在可能。虽然`wg.Go`期望一个没有参数的函数，但需要参数的函数可以被包装在一个匿名函数中。

本文还简要提到了Go 1.25的另一个改进：自动检测容器化环境（Kubernetes）中的CPU限制，不再需要像`automaxprocs`这样的库来正确设置`GOMAXPROCS`。作者鼓励探索`sync`包中的其他功能，并提供了一个包含示例的仓库链接。

title: Lightning declines over shipping lanes following regulation of sulfur emissions
summary:
This article explores the connection between ship emissions and lightning strikes, focusing on the impact of regulations on sulfur emissions in shipping fuel. Researchers noticed a distinct line of intense lightning activity over the busiest shipping lane near the Port of Singapore. They investigated the link between ship exhaust plumes and lightning frequency, particularly after the International Maritime Organization implemented regulations in 2020 that significantly reduced sulfur emissions in ship fuel.

The study found that lightning strikes over shipping lanes dropped by approximately 50% almost immediately after these regulations took effect. This "accidental experiment" demonstrates the sensitivity of thunderstorms to particulate matter emissions, specifically aerosol particles that act as condensation nuclei for cloud droplets and ice crystals. The reduction in sulfur emissions led to fewer of these particles, potentially resulting in fewer collisions between ice crystals within storm clouds, which are crucial for electrical charging and lightning generation.

The article emphasizes that while reduced lightning doesn't necessarily mean fewer storms or less rain, it highlights the significant, and previously less understood, influence of human pollution on thunderstorm activity. Further research is needed to determine the broader effects of aerosol particles on storms, including their potential to invigorate storm intensity and alter global lightning frequency. Understanding these effects is critical for predicting how the Earth's climate will respond to fluctuating human emissions.

该研究发现，这些法规生效后，航运线上空的雷击次数几乎立即下降了约50%。这项“意外实验”表明了雷暴对颗粒物排放的敏感性，特别是作为云滴和冰晶凝结核的气溶胶颗粒。硫排放的减少导致这些颗粒减少，可能导致暴风云内冰晶之间的碰撞减少，而冰晶碰撞对于电荷积累和雷电产生至关重要。

文章强调，虽然雷电减少并不一定意味着风暴减少或降雨减少，但它突出了人类污染对雷暴活动的显著且此前较少被理解的影响。还需要进一步研究来确定气溶胶颗粒对风暴的更广泛影响，包括它们增强风暴强度和改变全球雷电频率的潜力。了解这些影响对于预测地球气候将如何应对人类排放的波动至关重要。

title: I Hacked McDonald's (Security Contact Was Harder to Find Than Secret Recipe)
summary:
This article details a security researcher's experience uncovering multiple vulnerabilities within McDonald's systems and the difficulties faced in reporting them. The researcher initially found a client-side validation issue in the McDonald's app allowing for free nuggets, which was fixed after contacting a software engineer. This led to further investigation revealing more serious flaws.

One major issue was the "Feel-Good Design Hub," used for brand assets, which had a client-side password protection and a wide-open registration endpoint that emailed passwords in plaintext. The researcher also discovered plain text API keys in the JavaScript, potentially allowing for user data listing and phishing attacks. Algolia indexes were exposing personal information of users requesting access to McDonald's systems.

Furthermore, a crew member was able to access executive systems meant for corporate employees, including the TRT system, enabling global employee searches with email addresses and an impersonation feature. The GRS franchise owner tool had no authentication for admin functions, allowing arbitrary page content changes. Internal documents accessible via Stravito were also available to crew members. The new CosMc's restaurant had a coupon vulnerability, allowing unlimited use of a one-time coupon, and arbitrary data could be injected into orders.

The main challenge was the absence of a working security reporting channel. The researcher had to cold-call McDonald's HQ, dropping security employee names to eventually find a contact. While the vulnerabilities were mostly fixed, the researcher's friend who assisted with OAuth research was fired. The article concludes with recommendations for McDonald's, including maintaining a security.txt file, establishing a security contact, and considering a bug bounty program.

title: World Wide Lightning Location Network
summary:
The World Wide Lightning Location Network (WWLLN) is a global network operated by the University of Washington that monitors lightning activity using very low frequency (VLF) radio sensors. It aims to map lightning strikes across the entire Earth.

Key features of WWLLN include:

*   **Global Monitoring:** Detects lightning strikes worldwide using a network of over 70 sensors.
*   **Data Products:** Provides near real-time lightning maps, flash density maps, satellite animations overlaid with lightning data, and VLF spectrograms. Historical data is also available.
*   **Sensor Network:** Relies on a network of sensors hosted by universities, institutes, and researchers globally. Hosts receive worldwide data for their research.
*   **Lightning Detection:** Uses the time of group arrival (TOGA) from at least 5 sensors to locate lightning strikes.
*   **Accuracy and Efficiency:** Detects approximately 30% of strokes about 30 kA globally. Detection is most accurate when lightning is enclosed by sensors.
*   **Data Availability:** Archival data is available for purchase, and near real-time data is accessible for research or commercially.
*   **Partnerships:** The network relies on cooperation with numerous institutions worldwide that host sensors.

The WWLLN is continually looking for new sensor sites to improve coverage and accuracy. They encourage interested parties to contact them about hosting a sensor.

title: Converting an online game to work without any JavaScript
summary:
This article details the author's experiment in making their online board gaming website fully functional without JavaScript, using a "Progressive Enhancement" approach. The goal was to provide a usable experience even with JavaScript disabled, without sacrificing UX for users with JavaScript enabled.

The core strategy was server-side rendering using SvelteKit, providing an initial HTML page that's immediately viewable. To achieve full functionality without JavaScript, the author implemented several techniques:

*   **Interactive UI elements:** Used `<summary>` and `<details>` elements for dropdown menus and URL parameters to control modal dialogs.
*   **Form submissions:** Relied on `<form>` elements for all actions that change server state (game moves), intercepted by Svelte when JavaScript is enabled for websocket communication.
*   **Realtime updates:** Employed the `<meta http-equiv="refresh"` tag for automatic page refreshing, mimicking live updates, albeit with a delay.
*   **Animations:** Focused animations on Javascript users and ensured server-side rendering provides the correct final state.

The author identifies several benefits: faster initial page load due to server-side rendering, increased site resilience as state is primarily managed server-side, and improved semantic correctness of HTML. Drawbacks include increased server resource usage from frequent refreshes, additional code complexity, and slower feature development.

Ultimately, the author concludes that while the experiment improved the site's quality and performance, the significant effort required is likely not worth it for most projects, given the theoretical audience for JavaScript-less browsing. They intend to monitor usage without JavaScript and may eventually remove the extra code.
chinese_title: 将网络游戏转换为无需任何JavaScript也能运行的版本
chinese_summary:
本文详述了作者使用“渐进增强”方法，在不使用 JavaScript 的情况下，使其在线桌游网站实现全部功能的实验。目标是在禁用 JavaScript 的情况下也能提供可用的体验，同时不牺牲启用 JavaScript 用户的用户体验。

核心策略是使用 SvelteKit 进行服务器端渲染，提供一个可以立即查看的初始 HTML 页面。为了在没有 JavaScript 的情况下实现全部功能，作者采用了以下几种技术：

*   **交互式 UI 元素：** 使用 `<summary>` 和 `<details>` 元素来实现下拉菜单，并使用 URL 参数来控制模态对话框。
*   **表单提交：** 所有更改服务器状态的操作（游戏移动）都依赖于 `<form>` 元素，当启用 JavaScript 时，Svelte 会拦截这些操作以进行 websocket 通信。
*   **实时更新：** 采用 `<meta http-equiv="refresh"` 标签进行自动页面刷新，模拟实时更新，但会有延迟。
*   **动画：** 动画主要针对 JavaScript 用户，并确保服务器端渲染提供正确的最终状态。

作者认为，这样做有几个好处：由于服务器端渲染，初始页面加载速度更快；由于状态主要在服务器端管理，网站的恢复能力更强；HTML 的语义正确性也得到提高。缺点包括频繁刷新导致服务器资源使用量增加、代码复杂性增加以及功能开发速度减慢。

最终，作者得出结论，虽然该实验提高了网站的质量和性能，但考虑到理论上不使用 JavaScript 浏览的用户群体，所需的大量工作对于大多数项目来说可能并不值得。他们计划监控不使用 JavaScript 的使用情况，并可能最终删除额外的代码。

title: David Klein's TWA Posters (2018)
summary:
David Klein, born in El Paso, Texas, in 1918, is renowned for his vibrant and influential travel posters created for Trans World Airlines (TWA) in the 1950s and 1960s. He attended the Art Center School in Los Angeles and, after illustrating Army manuals during World War II, moved to New York and worked as an art director at Clifford Strohl Associates, designing advertising for Broadway shows.

TWA, under the ownership of Howard Hughes, was a leading airline at the time, known for being innovative, such as hiring the first African-American stewardess and pioneering in-flight movies and the use of Boeing 747s. In 1962, they opened their architecturally significant JFK terminal.

Klein's posters captured the excitement and optimism of the early years of post-war air travel and featured destinations like Los Angeles, San Francisco, New York, Washington, Switzerland, Las Vegas, Israel, Greece, Florida, Portugal, Paris, Africa and Hollywood. His work remains timeless and continues to be admired for its artistic merit and historical significance. chinese_title: 大卫·克莱恩的环球航空海报 (2018)
chinese_summary:
大卫·克莱恩，1918年生于德克萨斯州埃尔帕索，以其在 20 世纪 50 年代和 60 年代为环球航空公司 (TWA) 创作的充满活力且极具影响力的旅行海报而闻名。他曾就读于洛杉矶艺术中心学院，二战期间为陆军绘制手册后，搬到纽约，并在 Clifford Strohl Associates 担任艺术总监，为百老汇演出设计广告。

title: You can't grow cool-climate plants in hot climates
summary:
Joey Santore explains why cool-climate plants struggle in hot climates, focusing on the concept of "compensation point." Plants, like animals, respire, burning sugars for energy. Compensation point is the balance where photosynthesis equals respiration; growth requires photosynthesis to exceed respiration.

Warm nights, common in humid climates, accelerate respiration, causing cool-climate plants to burn through their carbohydrate reserves faster than they can replenish them through photosynthesis. This leads to weakened health, increased susceptibility to pests and diseases, and ultimately, death. The author uses tomatoes as an example, noting their high-altitude Andean origins explain their sensitivity to warm nights and humidity.

Conversely, tropical plants struggle in cooler climates because their metabolism slows, hindering their ability to produce defense chemicals and new growth.

The article also touches on the importance of sufficient light for plants to reach their compensation point, using a cactus example. Finally, the piece briefly discusses CAM, C3, and C4 photosynthesis, highlighting how different photosynthetic pathways have evolved to optimize carbon fixation in different temperature environments. C4 photosynthesis, for instance, is more efficient at high temperatures because it minimizes photorespiration, a process where the enzyme Rubisco binds with oxygen instead of carbon dioxide, hindering sugar production. Ultimately, a plant's survival hinges on the interplay of light, carbon dioxide, temperature, and its evolutionary adaptation to a specific climate.
chinese_title: 你不能在炎热气候种植喜凉植物。
chinese_summary:
Joey Santore解释了凉爽气候植物为何在炎热气候中难以生存，重点在于“补偿点”的概念。植物和动物一样，会进行呼吸作用，燃烧糖类获取能量。补偿点是光合作用等于呼吸作用的平衡点；生长需要光合作用超过呼吸作用。

潮湿气候中常见的温暖夜晚会加速呼吸作用，导致凉爽气候植物消耗碳水化合物储备的速度超过它们通过光合作用补充的速度。这会导致健康状况下降，对病虫害的抵抗力增强，最终导致死亡。作者以番茄为例，指出其高海拔安第斯山脉的起源解释了它们对温暖夜晚和湿度的敏感性。

相反，热带植物在较冷的气候中难以生存，因为它们的新陈代谢减慢，阻碍了它们产生防御化学物质和新的生长的能力。

文章还提到了充足的光照对植物达到补偿点的重要性，并以仙人掌为例。最后，文章简要讨论了CAM、C3和C4光合作用，强调了不同的光合途径是如何进化来优化不同温度环境下的碳固定的。例如，C4光合作用在高温下更有效，因为它最大限度地减少了光呼吸，光呼吸是指Rubisco酶与氧气而不是二氧化碳结合的过程，从而阻碍了糖的产生。最终，植物的生存取决于光照、二氧化碳、温度以及其对特定气候的进化适应之间的相互作用。

summary:

Many Setapp apps used on macOS were replaced with open-source or similar alternatives on Linux.

The article details tradeoffs between macOS and Linux, particularly regarding the screenshot tool (Snagit), battery life, hardware quality, and backup solutions. While macOS offered a seamless experience, Linux allows for deeper customization. Cloud sync was achieved with Filen, and keyboard shortcuts are managed with Kanata and XCompose. App launching and clipboard management are handled by Walker and Clipse.

Omarchy, a customized Arch Linux distribution, made the transition smoother, providing pre-configured settings and shortcuts. The author highlights the ease of navigation with Hyprland and the seamless integration of external monitors.

Challenges include the lack of a native Grammarly overlay and Microsoft Teams/Office app. Battery life and fan noise are also less ideal than on a MacBook. Despite these challenges, the author appreciates the customizability and control offered by Linux and expresses excitement about continuing the journey, constantly learning and improving their setup. title: My tips for using LLM agents to create software

Key advice includes providing the AI model with ample, relevant context; utilize a dedicated directory for storing internal and public-facing documentation. Reinforce instructions directly within the code, especially in test files, to avoid common errors. The author advises against allowing the AI to read large files directly but suggests it use tools to extract only what is needed. The author says that context size must be monitored and compacted or restarted if it loses focus.

When you predict areas of difficulty, bootstrap context by generating context documents up front. The author notes that while communication is important, explaining the 'why' matters only if it reveals new goals or guidelines.

The author also emphasizes the importance of having a design in mind, not just a goal, and collaborating with the AI to refine it. Keeping separate design documents for significant features helps save tokens and prevent unnecessary redesigns by the AI. By pointing the AI to an explicit design, it becomes less likely to suggest random refactoring.

title: Robots can now learn to use tools just by watching us
summary:
This article discusses a new framework called "Tool-as-Interface" that allows robots to learn how to use tools by watching videos of humans performing tasks. Developed by researchers at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, Columbia University, and UT Austin, this method aims to overcome the limitations of traditionally programmed robots, which struggle with adaptability and require extensive reprogramming for new tasks.

The process involves using two camera views of the action, processing them with a vision model (MASt3R) to reconstruct a 3D model of the scene, and then using 3D Gaussian splatting to generate multiple viewpoints. Crucially, the system digitally removes the human from the scene, focusing solely on the tool and its interaction with the environment using "Grounded-SAM". This "tool-centric" perspective allows the robot to learn the tool's trajectory and orientation, enabling skill transfer between different robots, regardless of their physical configuration.

The framework was tested on tasks like hammering a nail, scooping a meatball, and flipping food in a pan, achieving significantly higher success rates and faster training data acquisition compared to traditional teleoperation methods. Inspired by how children learn, the approach enables robots to adapt to dynamic situations, such as scooping meatballs while more are being added. While the system currently has limitations, such as assuming a rigidly fixed tool and challenges with 6D pose estimation, the researchers envision a future where robots can learn from readily available videos, creating a global training library for adaptable robots. The research won the Best Paper Award at the ICRA 2025 Workshop.
chinese_title: 机器人现在可以通过观察我们来学习使用工具。
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了一种名为“工具即界面”的新框架，该框架允许机器人通过观看人类执行任务的视频来学习如何使用工具。该方法由伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校、哥伦比亚大学和德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校的研究人员开发，旨在克服传统编程机器人的局限性，这些机器人难以适应新任务，并且需要大量的重新编程。

该过程包括使用两个摄像机视角拍摄动作，使用视觉模型 (MASt3R) 对其进行处理，以重建场景的 3D 模型，然后使用 3D 高斯溅射生成多个视点。至关重要的是，该系统会以数字方式将人类从场景中移除，仅使用“Grounded-SAM”专注于工具及其与环境的交互。这种“以工具为中心”的视角使机器人能够学习工具的轨迹和方向，从而实现不同机器人之间的技能转移，而无需考虑它们的物理配置。

该框架在诸如锤钉子、舀肉丸和在平底锅中翻转食物等任务上进行了测试，与传统的远程操作方法相比，获得了显着更高的成功率和更快的训练数据获取速度。受到儿童学习方式的启发，该方法使机器人能够适应动态情况，例如在不断添加肉丸的同时舀肉丸。尽管该系统目前存在局限性，例如假设工具是刚性固定的，以及在 6D 位姿估计方面面临挑战，但研究人员设想未来机器人可以从现成的视频中学习，从而创建一个用于适应性机器人的全球训练库。该研究荣获 ICRA 2025 年研讨会最佳论文奖。

title: The first Media over QUIC CDN: Cloudflare

title: Show HN: JavaScript-free (X)HTML Includes

The basic principle involves each XML file (e.g., `index.xml`) specifying an XSL template at the top. This template defines how custom XML tags within the XML file are rendered as standard HTML. This allows for the creation of reusable website components and consistent formatting.

The demonstration website provides examples of this approach. The "advanced/" directory contains more complex examples, showcasing how to define templates with fields and how to nest templates within each other, offering greater flexibility in website design. In essence, the project allows building static websites with reusable components and consistent styling purely client-side, relying on the browser's XSLT processing capabilities.

title: Nitro: A tiny but flexible init system and process supervisor
summary:
Nitro is a lightweight and flexible init system and process supervisor designed for various environments, including embedded systems, desktops, servers, initramfs, and containers. It offers advantages like zero memory allocation during runtime, no unbounded file descriptor usage, and a tiny static binary. Configuration is script-based, residing in a directory (defaulting to /etc/nitro) without requiring compilation.

Services are defined by directories containing optional `setup`, `run`, and `finish` scripts. The `log` symlink allows chaining services for log processing. Special services include `LOG` (default logging), `SYS` (for system-level setup, finalization, and handling fatal errors or reincarnation). Parameterized services are supported using the `@` suffix.

Nitro operates in three phases: bringing the system up, running services (with restarts on failure), and bringing the system down (SIGTERM then SIGKILL). It can be controlled remotely using `nitroctl`, offering commands for service management (start, stop, restart, signals), listing services, and system control (reboot, shutdown). It also responds to signals for `rescan`, `reboot`, and `shutdown` (except when used as pid 1).

Nitro can be used as a direct replacement for init on Linux and in Docker containers. On FreeBSD, it can be run from `/etc/ttys`.

服务由包含可选`setup`、`run`和`finish`脚本的目录定义。`log`符号链接允许链接服务进行日志处理。特殊服务包括`LOG`（默认日志记录）、`SYS`（用于系统级设置、完成以及处理致命错误或重生）。支持使用`@`后缀的参数化服务。

Nitro分三个阶段运行：启动系统、运行服务（失败时重启）和关闭系统（SIGTERM后SIGKILL）。可以使用`nitroctl`远程控制它，提供用于服务管理（启动、停止、重启、信号）、列出服务和系统控制（重启、关机）的命令。它还会响应`rescan`、`reboot`和`shutdown`信号（除非用作pid 1）。

title: ArduinoOS (2017)
summary:
ArduinoOS is an operating system designed for Arduino boards, enabling real multithreading, exception handling, and hardware abstraction, all while minimizing memory usage. Its kernel is written in assembly and C. The number of threads supported varies by board (e.g., 20 on Arduino Uno, 90 on Mega).

Key features include:

*   **Multithreading:** Enables concurrent execution of multiple tasks. Threads are created using `InitTask` or `InitTaskWithStackSize`.
*   **Exception Handling:** Uses integer-based exceptions for error handling through `try-catch` blocks. Provides various predefined exception codes.
*   **Locks:** Allows threads to safely access shared resources, preventing conflicts.
*   **Sleep:** Provides the `sleep()` function for pausing threads without blocking the entire system.
*   **Memory Management:** Offers functions like `freeMemory()` and `freeStack()` to monitor memory usage.
*   **Hardware Abstraction:** Includes abstract classes for common hardware components like LEDs, Keypads, Motors, Piezo speakers, and Servos.

The OS requires including the "KernelInitializer.h" header and initializing the kernel in the `setup()` function. Custom stack sizes can be defined for threads, but varying sizes can lead to memory fragmentation. Threads can also receive arguments. Kernel panic handling is available to manage critical errors. The kernel tick period can be adjusted to control thread switching frequency.

title: FFmpeg 8.0
summary:
This article summarizes the news and updates surrounding the FFmpeg project, a cross-platform solution for audio and video recording, conversion, and streaming, primarily from November 2023 to August 2025.

**FFmpeg 8.0 "Huffman" (August 2025)**: This major release features native decoders for APV, ProRes RAW, RealVideo 6.0, Sanyo LD-ADPCM, and G.728, improvements to the VVC decoder, and Vulkan compute-based codecs for FFv1 (encode/decode) and ProRes RAW (decode). It also introduces hardware-accelerated decoding (Vulkan VP9, VAAPI VVC, OpenHarmony H264/5) and encoding (Vulkan AV1, OpenHarmony H264/5). New formats (MCC, G.728, Whip, APV) and filters (colordetect, pad_cuda, scale_d3d11, Whisper) are included. A new class of decoders and encoders based on Vulkan compute is added, improving speed and enabling new use cases. The project's infrastructure has been modernized, including a new forge for contributions.

**FFmpeg 7.1 "Péter" (September 2024)**: This release declares the VVC decoder as stable, adds support for a native AAC USAC decoder, MV-HEVC decoding, and LC-EVC decoding. It merges Vulkan encoding support for H264 and HEVC, enabling fully Vulkan-based pipelines. Significant internal improvements were made to color range handling.

**Other Noteworthy News:**

*   **Coverity:** FFmpeg's code quality has improved significantly, with defect density lower than average.
*   **Native xHE-AAC Decoder:** FFmpeg now implements a native xHE-AAC decoder.
*   **Sovereign Tech Fund:** Germany's Sovereign Tech Fund became FFmpeg's first governmental sponsor.
*   **FFmpeg 7.0 "Dijkstra":** This release introduced a native VVC decoder (experimental), IAMF support, and a multi-threaded ffmpeg CLI tool.
*   **Vulkan Decoding:** Vulkan-powered decoding hardware acceleration was merged, enabling vendor-generic and platform-generic decoding.
*   **FFmpeg 6.0 "Von Neumann":** This release featured many new encoders, decoders and filters. Implemented new release schedules bumping the ABI.

title: Top Secret: Automatically filter sensitive information
summary:
This article introduces "Top Secret," a tool designed to automatically filter sensitive information from free text, which is particularly useful when working with chatbots, LLMs, and other scenarios where user data is processed. It addresses the challenge of protecting sensitive data that cannot be easily identified using regular expressions.

Top Secret leverages named-entity recognition (NER) to identify and classify real-world entities like people and locations. It works by filtering sensitive information and replacing it with placeholders (e.g., [PERSON_1], [LOCATION_1]). The tool provides a mapping between these placeholders and the original sensitive data, enabling the restoration of the filtered values later, for instance, in responses from a chatbot.

The article highlights three key use cases:

1.  **Working with LLMs:** Filtering user input before sending it to an LLM and then restoring the sensitive information in the response using the mapping.
2.  **Filtering Conversation History:** Ensuring sensitive data doesn't slip through previous messages by filtering every message before including it in a request.
3.  **Preventing Storing Sensitive Information with Validations:** Using Top Secret as a validation tool within a model to prevent the storage of sensitive information in a database. Filters can be customized and disabled as needed.

The article emphasizes the importance of protecting user data, especially with the increasing use of chatbots and LLMs. Top Secret aims to reduce the burden of manually filtering sensitive information.

title: Echidna Enters a New Era of Symbolic Execution
summary:
This article announces Echidna's enhanced symbolic execution capabilities integrated with hevm, offering two modes: Verification and Exploration. Verification mode proves the absence of bugs in stateless code by symbolically testing each method after constructor execution, mirroring formal verification techniques. It checks every possible path after constructor execution, confirming assertions hold but being limited by external calls and assumptions like infinite gas. The results can be "Verified," "Passed," "Failed," "Error," or "Timeout." Exploration mode combines fuzzing and symbolic execution to uncover assertion failures in stateful scenarios. It leverages a corpus accumulated through fuzzing, executing a single symbolic transaction on top to more exhaustively explore a particular state and reduce reliance on luck.

The article includes a case study using Algebra and an ERC4626 vault, illustrating the effectiveness of each mode. Verification mode identifies several passing invariants, while exploration mode quickly pinpoints an assertion failure in the vault code that fuzzing alone would struggle to find. While the article showcases the growing maturity of symbolic execution tools, it emphasizes the importance of understanding their limitations, particularly regarding unbounded loops and dynamic data structures, and the potential for developers to misinterpret results. Finally, the article explains how to enable the symbolic execution modes within Echidna, with a mention on the current not very intuitive interface.

title: Europe's crusade against air conditioning is insane
summary:
Noah Smith argues that Europe's resistance to adopting air conditioning is a harmful and illogical "crusade" driven by a mix of environmental concerns and cultural elitism. He points out that climate change is leading to a significant number of heat-related deaths in Europe, far exceeding the gun violence death rate in the US, and that air conditioning is a proven solution to reduce these fatalities, as demonstrated by the American experience.

The official European justification for avoiding AC is its contribution to climate change through electricity consumption. However, Smith suggests a deeper, cultural reason: a perception of AC as an unnecessary, "American" extravagance that goes against European tradition. He cites examples of regulations, social pressure, and superstitions surrounding AC use.

Smith criticizes this stance as a form of "degrowth" ideology, which prioritizes austerity and self-restraint over technological solutions. He contends that the relatively small emissions reduction achieved by forgoing AC is not worth the tens of thousands of preventable deaths. He argues that embracing technology, as Japan and Singapore have done, is essential for societal advancement and economic prosperity. He concludes that Europe's reluctance to adopt air conditioning is making it a less comfortable and more impoverished civilization.

欧洲官方避免使用空调的理由是其通过电力消耗对气候变化造成的贡献。 然而，史密斯认为，更深层的原因是一种文化因素：即认为空调是一种不必要的、 “美国的”奢侈品，与欧洲传统背道而驰。 他列举了围绕空调使用的法规、社会压力和迷信的例子。

title: Glyn: Type-safe PubSub and Registry for Gleam actors with distributed clustering
summary:
Glyn is a Gleam library that provides type-safe PubSub and Registry systems for actor communication, designed to work with distributed clustering using Erlang's syn library. It offers two methods for actor interaction: PubSub for broadcasting events to subscribers and Registry for direct command routing to named processes, both integrating with Gleam's actor model.

The library requires explicit decoders for messages to ensure type safety across cluster nodes. It uses Erlang terms for message passing, necessitating tuple decoding. The article provides examples of how to define message types and decoder functions using Gleam's `dynamic` and `decode` modules, focusing on `Event` and `Command` types.

Examples demonstrate basic PubSub functionality with `pubsub.new`, `pubsub.subscribe`, and `pubsub.publish`, alongside Registry use via `registry.new`, `registry.register`, `registry.send`, and `registry.call`.  The article also showcases how to integrate both systems into a single Gleam actor using `process.select` and `process.merge_selector` to create complex message handlers, offering a structured approach to managing diverse communication channels within an actor.

Finally, the document briefly covers development with `gleam test` and `gleam docs build` and specifies the MIT License.

title: Websites and web developers mostly don't care about client-side problems
summary:
Chris Siebenmann's "Websites and web developers mostly don't care about client-side problems" explains why users with older or suspicious browsers are encountering errors when accessing his blog, Wandering Thoughts, and CSpace. He's implemented anti-crawler measures to combat a surge in high-volume crawling, particularly from bots using outdated Chrome user agents, likely for LLM training. These measures inadvertently block legitimate users with older browsers.

Siebenmann acknowledges the inconvenience and encourages affected users with current browsers to contact him with their browser details and User-Agent string. He also addresses users accessing the site through archive services like archive.today, archive.ph, and archive.is. He criticizes these services for behaving similarly to malicious crawlers, using old Chrome User-Agents, untraceable IP addresses, and even falsified reverse DNS entries. He recommends using archive.org instead, as it's a better-behaved archival crawler capable of accessing his blog. The core issue is the difficulty in distinguishing legitimate users and benign archiving services from malicious crawlers, leading to a broad-stroke approach that impacts some genuine users.

title: The use of LLM assistants for kernel development
summary:
This LWN.net article from August 2025 discusses the ongoing debate within the kernel development community regarding the use of LLM (large language model) based tools for generating kernel patches. The debate was sparked by instances of LLM-generated patches being submitted, prompting discussions about disclosure policies and the overall acceptance of such contributions.

Some developers, like Vlastimil Babka and Lorenzo Stoakes, argue for a formal "kernel AI policy" to be established *before* widespread adoption, fearing that the current lack of guidelines will lead to a flood of poorly understood and potentially buggy patches. Concerns exist about contributors lacking the ability to explain or fix LLM-generated code.  The QEMU project's outright ban on LLM-generated contributions is referenced.

Others, like Mark Brown and Kees Cook, believe the tools are already in use and will continue to be regardless of policy.  They advocate for openness and honesty about LLM use to allow for consideration during code review.

The article highlights the discussion around disclosing LLM usage in patches, with suggestions ranging from a "Generated-by" or "Assisted-by" tag to including the information in the cover letter.  The appropriate level of disclosure is debated, with questions about code completion tools and compiler diagnostics.

Copyright and responsibility for LLM-generated code are also major concerns. While the Linux Foundation provides guidance, questions remain about how maintainers can verify compliance.  The use of the "Signed-off-by" tag is suggested as a way for submitters to take responsibility, but this doesn't alleviate concerns about maintainer overload and the potential influx of low-quality patches. The article concludes that the debate is likely to continue, with the issue already proposed for discussion at the 2025 Maintainers Summit.
chinese_title: 使用LLM助手进行内核开发

一些开发者，如Vlastimil Babka和Lorenzo Stoakes，主张在广泛采用*之前*建立正式的“内核AI政策”，担心当前缺乏指导方针会导致大量难以理解且可能存在错误的补丁涌入。人们担心贡献者缺乏解释或修复LLM生成的代码的能力。文章提到了QEMU项目彻底禁止LLM生成的贡献。

另一些开发者，如Mark Brown和Kees Cook，认为无论是否有政策，这些工具都已经在使用并将继续使用。他们提倡对LLM的使用保持开放和诚实，以便在代码审查期间进行考虑。

文章重点介绍了围绕在补丁中披露LLM使用情况的讨论，建议包括使用“Generated-by”或“Assisted-by”标签，或将信息包含在封面信中。适当的披露程度存在争议，并提出了关于代码完成工具和编译器诊断的问题。

LLM生成的代码的版权和责任也是主要问题。虽然Linux基金会提供了指导，但仍然存在维护者如何验证合规性的问题。建议使用“Signed-off-by”标签作为提交者承担责任的一种方式，但这并不能缓解人们对维护者负担过重和潜在的低质量补丁涌入的担忧。文章总结说，这场辩论可能会继续下去，该问题已被提议在2025年维护者峰会上进行讨论。

title: The issue of anti-cheat on Linux (2024)
summary:
This article discusses the challenges of implementing anti-cheat solutions on Linux for multiplayer games. While Linux gaming is growing due to Steam Deck and dissatisfaction with Windows, most competitive multiplayer games are unplayable because their anti-cheat systems (like BattlEye, Easy Anti-Cheat, Vanguard, and RICOCHET) don't function properly or at all on Linux.

The author explains how anti-cheat solutions work on Windows, focusing on blocking memory access and detecting/banning cheaters through a combination of usermode components, services, and kernel-mode drivers. He highlights Valorant as an example of a game that effectively combats cheating by integrating anti-cheat measures closely with game development, including kernel-level protection, data encryption, and active community monitoring.

The article addresses common concerns about kernel-mode anti-cheats, like security vulnerabilities and potential spying, arguing that such concerns are often overblown compared to existing vulnerabilities on Windows systems.

Ultimately, the core problem on Linux is its open nature, which makes it impossible to implement effective anti-cheat solutions comparable to Windows. The author explains how Linux's kernel can be easily modified to bypass any anti-cheat measures, rendering them ineffective. While some anti-cheat solutions like Easy Anti-Cheat may appear to work on Linux, they often only perform basic functions and are easily bypassed by cheats.
chinese_title: Linux上的反作弊问题 (2024)
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了在Linux上为多人游戏实施反作弊方案所面临的挑战。虽然由于Steam Deck和对Windows的不满，Linux游戏正在增长，但大多数竞技性多人游戏都无法进行，因为它们的反作弊系统（如BattlEye、Easy Anti-Cheat、Vanguard和RICOCHET）在Linux上无法正常工作，甚至根本无法工作。

作者解释了反作弊解决方案在Windows上的工作原理，重点介绍了如何通过用户模式组件、服务和内核模式驱动程序的组合来阻止内存访问以及检测/封禁作弊者。他以Valorant为例，强调了该游戏通过将反作弊措施与游戏开发紧密结合，包括内核级保护、数据加密和积极的社区监控，有效地打击作弊行为。

文章探讨了关于内核模式反作弊的常见担忧，例如安全漏洞和潜在的间谍行为，并认为与Windows系统上现有的漏洞相比，这些担忧通常被夸大了。

最终，Linux上的核心问题在于其开放性，这使得无法实施与Windows相当的有效反作弊方案。作者解释了Linux内核如何能被轻易修改以绕过任何反作弊措施，使其失效。虽然某些反作弊解决方案（如Easy Anti-Cheat）可能看起来可以在Linux上工作，但它们通常只执行基本功能，并且很容易被作弊者绕过。

title: It’s not wrong that "\u{1F926}\u{1F3FC}\u200D\u2642\uFE0F".length == 7 (2019)
summary:
This article delves into the complexities of string length calculation in various programming languages when dealing with Unicode characters, specifically emojis like "🤦🏼‍♂️".  The author highlights that the `.length` property in JavaScript returning 7 for "🤦🏼‍♂️" is not inherently "wrong", but reflects how JavaScript (and other languages like Python 3 and Rust) counts string length based on code units of the underlying Unicode Encoding Form (UTF-16 for Javascript, UTF-32 for Python 3 and UTF-8 for Rust).

The article explains that "🤦🏼‍♂️" is composed of multiple Unicode scalar values representing different components (face palm, skin tone modifier, gender sign, and variation selector). Thus, JavaScript counts the number of UTF-16 code units (7), Python 3 counts the number of UTF-32 code units (5) and Rust counts the number of UTF-8 code units (17).

Swift, on the other hand, uses the concept of "extended grapheme clusters" and returns a length of 1, treating the entire emoji as a single visual unit. The article emphasizes that different languages offer different levels of abstraction and control over how string length is determined. The article further discusses trade-offs related to when to calculate and store length information (eagerly vs. lazily) and the advantages of remembering the storage-native code unit length. Ultimately, the "correct" length depends on the specific use case and the desired level of detail.
chinese_summary:
本文深入探讨了在处理Unicode字符，特别是像"🤦🏼‍♂️"这样的表情符号时，各种编程语言中字符串长度计算的复杂性。作者指出，JavaScript中`.length`属性对"🤦🏼‍♂️"返回7并非本质上的“错误”，而是反映了JavaScript（以及其他语言，如Python 3和Rust）如何基于底层Unicode编码形式的代码单元来计算字符串长度（JavaScript为UTF-16，Python 3为UTF-32，Rust为UTF-8）。

文章解释说，"🤦🏼‍♂️"由多个Unicode标量值组成，这些标量值代表不同的组成部分（捂脸，肤色修饰符，性别符号和变体选择器）。因此，JavaScript计算UTF-16代码单元的数量（7），Python 3计算UTF-32代码单元的数量（5），而Rust计算UTF-8代码单元的数量（17）。

另一方面，Swift使用“扩展字位簇”的概念，并返回长度1，将整个表情符号视为单个视觉单元。文章强调，不同的语言提供了不同程度的抽象和对字符串长度确定方式的控制。文章进一步讨论了何时计算和存储长度信息（急切与懒惰）以及记住存储原生代码单元长度的优势相关的权衡。最终，“正确”的长度取决于具体的用例和所需的细节级别。

title: Measuring the environmental impact of AI inference
summary:
This Ars Technica article discusses the environmental impact of AI inference, focusing on Google's new analysis of its own AI usage. While the increased electricity demand in the US, partly driven by data centers for AI, raises concerns about the environmental cost, particularly given the rise in coal usage, precise measurements are difficult.

Google's analysis, a rare glimpse into real-world data, reveals a surprising 33x reduction in energy consumption per search query in just one year. This improvement stems from factors like increased renewable energy use, but primarily from software optimizations like Mixture-of-Experts and compact model versions, alongside efficient data center management and custom AI accelerator design.

The analysis includes the energy used by CPUs, AI accelerators, and memory, both active and idle, as well as the data center's overall energy and water consumption, and even factors in the carbon emissions from hardware production. However, it excludes the environmental cost of networking, end-user hardware, and AI model training, though the latter could be reasonably estimated.

Google estimates that a typical text prompt in Gemini Apps consumes 0.24 watt-hours of energy, emits 0.03 grams of CO2 equivalent, and uses 0.26 milliliters of water, roughly equivalent to nine seconds of TV viewing. While the individual impact is small, the volume of requests is high.

Despite the progress, the article underscores the need for comprehensive measurement frameworks and encourages other companies to adopt similar approaches to ensure environmental efficiency keeps pace with AI advancements. Google’s transparency and detailed methodology are highlighted as a positive step towards industry-wide improvements.
chinese_title: 测量人工智能推理的环境影响
chinese_summary:
这篇Ars Technica文章探讨了人工智能推理对环境的影响，重点介绍了谷歌对其自身人工智能使用情况的新分析。虽然美国电力需求的增长（部分原因是人工智能数据中心）引发了人们对环境成本的担忧，特别是考虑到煤炭使用量的增加，但精确的测量非常困难。

谷歌的分析（罕见地揭示了真实世界的数据）显示，仅仅一年内，每次搜索查询的能源消耗就惊人地减少了33倍。这种改进源于可再生能源使用量的增加等因素，但主要源于软件优化，如混合专家系统和紧凑型模型版本，以及高效的数据中心管理和定制人工智能加速器设计。

该分析包括CPU、人工智能加速器和内存（包括激活和空闲状态）的能耗，以及数据中心的整体能源和用水量，甚至包括硬件生产中的碳排放。但是，它不包括网络、终端用户硬件和人工智能模型训练的环境成本，尽管后者可以合理估计。

谷歌估计，在Gemini Apps中，一个典型的文本提示消耗0.24瓦时电量，排放0.03克二氧化碳当量，并使用0.26毫升水，大致相当于观看9秒电视。虽然个人影响很小，但请求量很大。

尽管取得了进展，但文章强调需要全面的测量框架，并鼓励其他公司采用类似的方法，以确保环境效率与人工智能的进步保持同步。谷歌的透明度和详细的方法被强调为行业改进的积极一步。

title: Using game theory to explain how institutions arise to manage limited resources
summary:
This article discusses research by RIKEN and the University of Copenhagen that uses game theory to explain how self-organized institutions emerge to manage limited resources like fisheries and water. These institutions are characterized by norms and rules developed organically at the grassroots level, ensuring sustainable resource use and equitable access.

The researchers created a simple mathematical model involving two individuals periodically harvesting a resource (e.g., fish). Each person decides whether to harvest based on fish stocks and their own and the other person's well-being. They can cooperate by restraining themselves, punish the other by over-harvesting, or act selfishly. These choices are determined by current fish stocks and past interactions.

Despite its simplicity, the model successfully predicted the emergence of self-organized institutions. The key finding is that even with minimal parameters, the model demonstrates how these institutions can arise naturally. The researchers believe this model provides a foundation for understanding the formation of such institutions and plan to apply it to other contexts like gift-giving in modern societies. The research was published in PNAS.
chinese_title: 使用博弈论解释制度如何产生以管理有限资源
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了日本理化学研究所和哥本哈根大学的一项研究，该研究利用博弈论解释了如何自组织机构涌现以管理渔业和水等有限资源。这些机构的特点是基层有机发展起来的规范和规则，从而确保可持续的资源利用和公平的获取。

研究人员创建了一个简单的数学模型，涉及定期收获资源（例如鱼）的两个人。每个人根据鱼类种群以及自己和他人的福祉来决定是否收获。他们可以通过克制自己来合作，通过过度捕捞来惩罚对方，或者自私地行事。这些选择取决于当前的鱼类种群和过去的互动。

尽管该模型很简单，但它成功地预测了自组织机构的出现。关键发现是，即使参数最少，该模型也能证明这些机构如何自然产生。研究人员认为该模型为理解此类机构的形成提供了基础，并计划将其应用于现代社会中的送礼等其他情境。该研究发表在《美国国家科学院院刊》（PNAS）上。

title: Ne Zha II is the biggest movie in the world
summary:
Jackson Weaver's article for CBC News explores the phenomenal success of the Chinese animated film *Ne Zha II*, examining its cultural significance and potential impact on the global film industry. The film has broken box office records, becoming the highest-grossing animated movie of all time and surpassing many Hollywood blockbusters, primarily driven by its success in China.

The article explains the plot, adapted from the classic Chinese novel *Investiture of the Gods*, focusing on Ne Zha's journey of self-discovery and acceptance as he struggles against his predetermined fate as a demon. It emphasizes the film's exploration of Taoist philosophy, where good and evil are interconnected and not absolute.

*Ne Zha II*'s success is attributed to its compelling story, stunning animation, and action-packed sequences, as well as its resonance with Chinese audiences due to Ne Zha's established cultural cachet. Weaver also highlights the film's contribution to the growing confidence in China's film industry, viewing it as a potential shift in the global film landscape, challenging Hollywood's dominance. A24's release of an English dub in North America is seen as a test of whether Chinese cinema can expand its influence abroad. Overall, the article paints *Ne Zha II* as a deserving cinematic achievement and a symbol of China's rising cultural influence.
chinese_title: 哪吒二是世界第一大电影。
chinese_summary:
杰克逊·韦弗在加拿大广播公司新闻发表的文章探讨了中国动画电影《哪吒II》的巨大成功，分析了其文化意义和对全球电影产业的潜在影响。这部电影打破了票房纪录，成为有史以来票房最高的动画电影，超越了许多好莱坞大片，这主要得益于其在中国市场的成功。

文章解释了剧情，改编自中国古典小说《封神演义》，重点讲述了哪吒在与他作为魔的既定命运作斗争时，自我发现和接受的旅程。文章强调了这部电影对道教哲学的探索，即善与恶是相互关联的，而不是绝对的。

《哪吒II》的成功归功于其引人入胜的故事、令人惊叹的动画和动感十足的场面，以及它与中国观众的共鸣，这得益于哪吒既有的文化影响力。韦弗还强调了这部电影对中国电影产业日益增长的信心的贡献，认为这是全球电影格局的潜在转变，挑战了好莱坞的统治地位。A24在北美发行英文配音版被视为检验中国电影是否能扩大其海外影响力的尝试。总的来说，这篇文章将《哪吒II》描绘成一部当之无愧的电影成就，也是中国文化影响力上升的象征。

title: Leaving Gmail for Mailbox.org
summary:
Giulio Magnifico details his switch from Gmail to Mailbox.org, driven by privacy concerns regarding Google's data collection and U.S. government access to emails. After considering Proton Mail and Tutanota (both offering end-to-end encryption), he opted for Mailbox.org due to its PGP integration, which allows him to continue using Apple's Mail app on macOS and iOS.

Mailbox.org provides 10GB of email storage and 5GB of cloud storage starting at €2.50/month (paid annually), with expandable storage options. Giulio was particularly pleased with the simple and effective web interface and the folder system that integrates seamlessly with Apple Mail. While Mailbox.org includes features like video chat and task lists, he primarily focused on email functionality.

The migration was done using `imapsync` within a Docker container on his archive server. He meticulously configured the script to avoid duplicates and merge specific folders. The process took about 3 hours to transfer 2.14GB of data.

To ensure a smooth transition, Giulio set up email forwarding from his old Gmail account and flagged emails forwarded from Gmail within Mailbox.org, allowing him to update his email address across his services. He also appreciates Mailbox.org's easy import of PGP keys, enabling encrypted communication, even on iOS. Ultimately, Giulio expresses satisfaction with his decision, highlighting the unexpected positive aspects of moving away from Gmail.
chinese_title: 离开Gmail转用Mailbox.org
chinese_summary:
朱利奥·马尼菲科详述了其从Gmail切换到Mailbox.org的经历，原因是出于对谷歌数据收集以及美国政府访问邮件的隐私担忧。在考虑了Proton Mail和Tutanota（两者都提供端到端加密）后，他选择了Mailbox.org，因为其PGP集成使他能够继续在macOS和iOS上使用Apple的Mail应用。

Mailbox.org提供10GB的电子邮件存储空间和5GB的云存储空间，起价为每月2.50欧元（按年付费），并提供可扩展的存储选项。朱利奥对简单而有效的网页界面以及与Apple Mail无缝集成的文件夹系统感到特别满意。虽然Mailbox.org包含视频聊天和任务列表等功能，但他主要关注的是电子邮件功能。

迁移是在其存档服务器上使用Docker容器内的`imapsync`完成的。他精心配置了脚本，以避免重复并合并特定文件夹。该过程花费了大约3个小时来传输2.14GB的数据。

为了确保平稳过渡，朱利奥设置了从其旧Gmail帐户的电子邮件转发，并在Mailbox.org中标记了从Gmail转发的电子邮件，这使他可以更新其在各个服务上的电子邮件地址。他还赞赏Mailbox.org轻松导入PGP密钥的功能，从而实现了加密通信，即使在iOS上也是如此。最终，朱利奥对他的决定表示满意，并强调了远离Gmail后意想不到的积极方面。

title: Bluesky Goes Dark in Mississippi over Age Verification Law
summary:
Bluesky has blocked all Mississippi IP addresses in response to a recent US Supreme Court decision allowing the state to enforce strict age verification for social media platforms. Bluesky argues that Mississippi's approach to verification, which would require tracking all users under 18 and requesting sensitive personal information from all users to verify age, is not feasible with their current resources and infrastructure. Non-compliance could result in fines of up to $10,000 per violation.

Bluesky views the law as creating significant barriers that limit free speech and disproportionately harm smaller platforms. The company believes effective child safety policies should be carefully tailored without creating huge obstacles for smaller providers.

Age verification laws, intended to protect children, have already had broad impacts in places like the UK, requiring ID scans and other methods to prove age. Texas has a similar law upheld by the Supreme Court, raising concerns about free speech. Critics argue that these laws can be circumvented using VPNs and other methods, and may even put children at greater risk of identity theft and privacy violations. Bluesky is the first major social media platform to take such drastic action against age verification laws.
chinese_title: 因年龄验证法案，Bluesky 在密西西比州停止服务
chinese_summary:
Bluesky屏蔽密西西比州所有IP地址，以回应美国最高法院允许该州强制执行社交媒体平台严格年龄验证的最新裁决。Bluesky认为，密西西比州的验证方式要求追踪所有18岁以下用户，并向所有用户索取敏感个人信息以验证年龄，这在他们目前的资源和基础设施条件下是不可行的。违规行为可能导致每次高达1万美元的罚款。

Bluesky认为该法律制造了限制言论自由的重大障碍，并对较小型平台造成不成比例的损害。该公司认为，有效的儿童安全政策应经过精心定制，而不应为较小型供应商制造巨大障碍。

旨在保护儿童的年龄验证法律已经在英国等地产生了广泛影响，需要进行身份扫描和其他方法来证明年龄。德克萨斯州也有一项类似的法律得到最高法院的支持，引发了对言论自由的担忧。批评人士认为，这些法律可以通过VPN和其他方法规避，甚至可能使儿童面临更大的身份盗窃和隐私侵犯风险。Bluesky是第一个对年龄验证法律采取如此严厉行动的主要社交媒体平台。

title: I'm too dumb for Zig's new IO interface
summary:
This article documents the author's struggle with the new `std.Io.Reader` and `std.Io.Writer` interface introduced in Zig 0.15, specifically when trying to upgrade their libraries to use the new `std.crypto.tls.Client`. They find the new interface confusing and inconsistent, particularly in contrast to the previous (also problematic) interface.

The author details the steps taken to adapt the `tls.Client.init` function, which requires `std.Io.Reader` and `std.Io.Writer` instead of the familiar `net.Stream`. This involves using the `reader()` and `writer()` methods of `net.Stream` and converting the returned types to the expected interface types using `interface()` and `&interface`, respectively. The author notes the inconsistency in accessing the interface.

The author also grapples with the required buffer parameters for both readers and writers, which must be at least `std.crypto.tls.max_ciphertext_record_len` large. They highlight the seemingly mandatory options passed to `tls.Client.init`, namely `ca_bundle`, `host`, `write_buffer`, and `read_buffer`, and question why these aren't optional.

After providing all the necessary parameters, the program initially hangs, which the author resolves by allocating a second pair of buffers for the `write_buffer` and `read_buffer` options. Finally, they encounter difficulties in reading the response from the `tls_client.reader` due to the lack of a standard `read` method, and resort to using `stream(&w, .limited(buf.len))` to transfer data to a fixed-size writer, `w`, to extract the response, but the code is not working properly. They ultimately feel lost and overwhelmed by the complexity of the new interface and the lack of clear documentation and examples.
chinese_title: 我太笨了，学不会 Zig 的新 IO 接口。
chinese_summary:
本文记录了作者在使用 Zig 0.15 中引入的新的 `std.Io.Reader` 和 `std.Io.Writer` 接口时遇到的困难，尤其是在尝试升级他们的库以使用新的 `std.crypto.tls.Client` 时。他们发现这个新接口令人困惑且不一致，特别是与之前的（同样有问题的）接口相比。

作者详细描述了调整 `tls.Client.init` 函数的步骤，该函数需要 `std.Io.Reader` 和 `std.Io.Writer`，而不是熟悉的 `net.Stream`。这涉及到使用 `net.Stream` 的 `reader()` 和 `writer()` 方法，并分别使用 `interface()` 和 `&interface` 将返回的类型转换为预期的接口类型。作者注意到访问接口时的不一致性。

作者还努力解决 readers 和 writers 所需的缓冲区参数，这些参数必须至少为 `std.crypto.tls.max_ciphertext_record_len` 大小。他们强调了传递给 `tls.Client.init` 的看似强制的选项，即 `ca_bundle`、`host`、`write_buffer` 和 `read_buffer`，并质疑为什么这些不是可选的。

在提供所有必要的参数后，程序最初挂起，作者通过为 `write_buffer` 和 `read_buffer` 选项分配第二对缓冲区来解决此问题。最后，由于缺少标准的 `read` 方法，他们在从 `tls_client.reader` 读取响应时遇到了困难，并求助于使用 `stream(&w, .limited(buf.len))` 将数据传输到固定大小的 writer `w`，以提取响应，但代码无法正常工作。他们最终感到迷失，并被新接口的复杂性以及缺乏清晰的文档和示例所淹没。

title: Closing the Nix gap: From environments to packaged applications for rust
summary:
This article addresses the confusion developers face when choosing a Nix packaging tool for Rust applications (crate2nix, cargo2nix, naersk, etc.). `devenv` aims to simplify this process by providing a consistent interface for both development and deployment.

During development, `devenv` provides necessary tools (cargo, rustc, rust-analyzer) via `languages.rust.enable` without requiring Nix expertise. When deploying, `languages.rust.import` leverages `crate2nix` to package the Rust application. This eliminates the need for developers to research and choose a specific packaging tool, as `devenv` has already evaluated and selected `crate2nix`.

This approach mirrors a previous decision where `devenv` seamlessly transitioned from `fenix` to `rust-overlay` for Rust toolchains.

title: How Not to Buy a SSD
summary:

Suspecting fraud, the author used F3 (Fight Flash Fraud) to test the drive's capacity, but the drive became unusable and started throwing errors when attempting to format it.

The author suspects the drive is a genuine, smaller (128GB) Kingston SSD that had its firmware rewritten to falsely report a 960GB capacity. The author points to the low-quality back sticker print as an initial warning sign. He warns readers to be cautious when buying from third-party sellers on large platforms, even if "fulfilled by" the retailer, as it's a common scam tactic.

The author contacted eMag to report the fraudulent seller and request a refund. The product listing has since been altered, making it difficult to initiate a return. The author also highlights how the drive performance degrades dramatically after filling up approximately 128GB, further supporting the theory. Ultimately, eMag customer support agreed to initiate the refund process, and the author received a full refund.

title: Io_uring, kTLS and Rust for zero syscall HTTPS server
summary:
This article explores building a high-performance HTTPS server using Rust, io_uring, and kTLS to minimize syscalls and maximize efficiency. The author traces the evolution of web server architectures from pre-forking to epoll, highlighting the increasing importance of reducing syscall overhead.

Io_uring is presented as a solution that allows asynchronous queuing of kernel operations, minimizing syscalls.  The kernel and server exchange work and results through memory queues, leading to near syscall-free operation under heavy load. The ideal setup involves one thread per core, optimized for NUMA architectures to minimize memory access latency.  Memory allocation is managed by pre-allocating fixed chunks for connections to avoid syscalls and fragmentation.

kTLS offloads encryption/decryption to the kernel, enabling `sendfile()` and potentially hardware offloading for further performance gains. Descriptorless files using `register_files` further reduce overhead by avoiding file descriptor passing between user and kernel space.

The author built "tarweb," a web server serving content from a tar file, as a practical application of these technologies.  They faced challenges integrating io_uring and kTLS due to missing `setsockopt()` support, requiring custom PRs to rustls.

The article concludes by acknowledging the inherent safety concerns of io_uring due to manual memory management. The author suggests the need for a safer Rust wrapper crate to leverage Rust's borrow checker and memory safety guarantees, avoiding potential data corruption and segfaults. The author has not yet benchmarked tarweb due to ongoing code refinement.

chinese_summary:

Io_uring 被视为一种解决方案，它允许内核操作的异步排队，从而最大限度地减少系统调用。内核和服务器通过内存队列交换工作和结果，在高负载下实现接近无系统调用的操作。理想的设置涉及每个核心一个线程，针对 NUMA 架构进行了优化，以最大限度地减少内存访问延迟。内存分配通过预先为连接分配固定块来管理，以避免系统调用和碎片。

kTLS 将加密/解密卸载到内核，从而可以进行 `sendfile()` 操作，并有可能进行硬件卸载以获得进一步的性能提升。使用 `register_files` 的无描述符文件通过避免在用户和内核空间之间传递文件描述符来进一步降低开销。

作者构建了一个名为“tarweb”的 Web 服务器，该服务器从 tar 文件提供内容，作为这些技术的实际应用。他们面临着集成 io_uring 和 kTLS 的挑战，因为缺少 `setsockopt()` 支持，这需要自定义 PR 到 rustls。

文章最后承认了 io_uring 由于手动内存管理而存在的固有安全问题。作者建议需要一个更安全的 Rust 封装 crate，以利用 Rust 的借用检查器和内存安全保证，避免潜在的数据损坏和段错误。由于代码仍在改进中，作者尚未对 tarweb 进行基准测试。

title: The ROI of Exercise
summary:
This article argues for the high return on investment (ROI) of regular exercise. The author, a consistent exerciser, highlights the often-overlooked benefit of increased lifespan, setting aside immediate benefits like strength, focus, and mental health for a simple thought experiment.

The author conservatively estimates that consistent exercise (3 hours/week) translates to roughly one year of total exercise over an adult lifetime. Citing studies showing a 3-10 year increase in lifespan from regular physical activity, they conservatively use a 10-year increase based on tennis studies. This results in a 1:10 ROI – one year of exercise yielding ten extra years of life.

While acknowledging the oversimplification and the presence of confounding factors, the author emphasizes that the time spent exercising is not wasted. They find joy and community within the activity and highlights the numerous other benefits beyond longevity, including improved sleep, reduced frailty, increased strength, cognitive function, and access to communities.

Finally, the author stresses the accessibility of exercise, comparing it to the time spent watching Netflix and encourages readers to start slowly and build a sustainable exercise routine.

title: What Happened to Egghead Software
summary:
Dave Farquhar's article explores the rise and fall of Egghead Software, a retail store specializing in computer software from 1984 to 2001. Founded by Victor D. Alhadeff, Egghead aimed to provide a consumer-friendly shopping experience with a wide selection and discounted prices. The company experienced rapid growth, fueled by an IPO in 1988 and the opening of around 200 stores nationwide.

However, Egghead struggled to maintain profitability despite the booming PC market in the 1990s. The rise of consumer electronics superstores like Best Buy and Circuit City, which offered a wider range of products and aggressive pricing, put pressure on Egghead. These superstores could devote as much space to software as an entire Egghead store, diminishing Egghead's competitive advantage.

To adapt, Egghead transitioned to online sales in 1998, closing all its storefronts. It then merged with Onsale, an online auction site, in 1999. Despite brisk sales, the company continued to lose money. Ultimately, Egghead's business model proved unsustainable. In 2001, the company declared bankruptcy, and Amazon acquired its domain name and related assets. While Egghead's legacy lives on through remnants like branded floppy disks, its retail model is unlikely to return due to the prevalence of digital software distribution.

title: What about using rel="share-url" to expose sharing intents?
summary:
This article proposes a standardized way for websites to expose their sharing mechanisms using a new HTML `rel` attribute, `rel="share-url"`. Currently, sharing to different platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, and BlueSky requires different URL structures and parameters (some accept URLs and titles, some only URLs, and others just text). The `rel="share-url"` attribute would provide a URL template for each platform's sharing intent.  For example:

*   `<link rel="share-url" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u={url}&t={text}">`
*   `<link rel="share-url" href="https://bsky.app/intent/compose?text={text}">`

The `{url}` and `{text}` placeholders would be dynamically replaced with the URL and title/description of the page being shared.  For platforms that only accept text, the proposal suggests using `{text}`, possibly concatenating the URL into the text field.

The article suggests formalizing this proposal by writing a specification and registering the new `rel` value on the microformats page, then encouraging social networks to adopt it.

title: U.S. government takes 10% stake in Intel

This development follows Intel's earlier announcement of a $2 billion investment from SoftBank. The move is driven by concerns about Intel's technological competitiveness compared to companies like Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and the desire to bolster domestic chip production, particularly in the face of delays in the construction of Intel's Ohio factory. Lutnick emphasized the government's pursuit of equity stakes in exchange for CHIPS Act funding.
